title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Friday, with Carlos Alcaraz, Alexander Zverev and Jack Draper winning their opening matches. Francesco Passaro edged Grigor Dimitrov. html:
Rome

Alcaraz, Zverev, Draper win opening matches

May 09, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Friday, with Carlos Alcaraz, Alexander Zverev and Jack Draper winning their opening matches. Francesco Passaro edged Grigor Dimitrov.

View all the Rome tennis results from Friday below.
